import React from "react" import './css/SignupPage.css'; class SignupPage extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { fullName: "", email: "", password: "", mobileNumber: "" } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event){ const {name, value} = event.target this.setState({[name] : value}) } render(){ return(

Hello!

Sign Up

) } } export default SignupPage;
